amendment.description: An amendment to strike the $2 million in funding for the Office of the Assistant Secretary of the Army for Civil Works and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the $2 million in funding for the Office of the Assistant Secretary of the Army for Civil Works and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Bilirakis amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Bilirakis.
